DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate impact classroom teacher ' educational intervention 1st 2nd grade child 's physical activity level energy expenditure physical education class elementary public school , São Paulo , Brazil .
DOC.detailed_description: This study School-based Randomized Controlled Trial . Three-step cluster sample use subject selection . In first step , 8 school Vila Mariana district - São Paulo select assign randomly physical activity intervention ( 3 school ) control condition ( 5 school ) . In second step , 48 class 1st 2nd grade select . In third step , 352 child randomly select compose observational group . In group , questionnaire data SOFIT 's observation collect two time : `` pre '' ( immediately intervention ) , `` post '' ( immediately intervention ) , six week interval . No educational intervention take place control school project run . Afterwards control school receive training .
DOC.criteria: child 7 10 year age , enrol 1st 2nd grade select school Vila Mariana Sao Paulo . Not observation .
